title: Google Glass
summary: Google Glass, or simply Glass, is a brand of smart glassesâ€”an optical head-mounted display designed in the shape of a pair of glasses. It was developed by X (previously Google X)[9] with the mission of producing a ubiquitous computer.[1] Google Glass displays information in a smartphone-like, hands-free format.[10] Wearers communicate with the Internet via natural language voice commands.[11][12]
